title: Associate Lecturer
employer: University of the Arts London, London
oneLiner: Teaching Arduino and physical computing to master's students at UAL's Creative Coding Institute.
description: Teaching Arduino and physical computing to master's students, with a focus on wearables, sculpture history, and material composition.

section.subtitle: 2023 - Wearables Class
section.text: Followed the direction of the head of department and led a class focused on wearables.
responsibilities: Showed great capacity to quickly adapt to new situations and work around stressful environments.

section.subtitle: 2024 - Sculpture and Material Composition Focus
section.text: Working with Senior Lecturer and full-time Associate Lecturer to build the class, focusing on sculpture history, material, and composition to encourage students to deviate from creating a product or solving for an issue.
responsibilities: Work as a team on class structure.

skillsGained: Guiding students through creative and technical problem-solving.
Collaboration with faculty and adapting to new teaching directions.
